ArkCharacter.Name: Aaron Ingram
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759542
ArkCharacter.Notes: Prisoner trapped and still alive in Psychotronics. Prisoner # V-090655-13

ArkCharacter.Name: Abigail Foy
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759543
ArkCharacter.Notes: Game master of the RPG group. Danielle Sho's girlfriend. Her belongings are a key in locating Danielle.

ArkCharacter.Name: Adrian Holland
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759544
ArkCharacter.Notes: Prisoner # V-110655-27; died in the derelict shuttle

ArkCharacter.Name: Aime Schmidt
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759545
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the Ballistics Lab hallway in Hardware Labs

ArkCharacter.Name: Akande Benin
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759546
ArkCharacter.Notes: Assigned to Deep Storage. Part of Sarai's "loyal team", reporting back to her.

ArkCharacter.Name: Alejandro Mata
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759548
ArkCharacter.Notes: Died in initial telepath attack on cafeteria. Headless at a table.

ArkCharacter.Name: Alfred Rose
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759550
ArkCharacter.Notes: Normally a patrol officer, but occasionally he does a shift in the Lobby when one of the others has a day off. Alfred hates sitting in one place, so when posted here he tends to wander the entire section. A few times he's been reprimanded for being away from his desk when an Executive passed by, but he persists in his wandering ways. He may have collected notes on the people that work in the Arboretum At game start: in the Cargo Bay with Sarah

ArkCharacter.Name: Alice Aiken
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759551
ArkCharacter.Notes: Calls Robert Gage urging him to leave the Sim labs.

ArkCharacter.Name: Allison Brady
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759553
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab

ArkCharacter.Name: Alika James
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759552
ArkCharacter.Notes: Bridge worker dead in Crew.

ArkCharacter.Name: Alton Weber
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759554
ArkCharacter.Notes: Stationed in Life Support

ArkCharacter.Name: Anders Kline
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759556
ArkCharacter.Notes: Currently dead in the Magnetosphere chamber in the GUTs.

ArkCharacter.Name: Andrea Hudson
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759557
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab

ArkCharacter.Name: Andrew Grey
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759558
ArkCharacter.Notes: Used to be Andrew Brown. Dead near Alex's grav Lift in arboretum.

ArkCharacter.Name: Annalise Gallegos
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759562
ArkCharacter.Notes: She is the whistleblower who works in Pyschotronics

ArkCharacter.Name: Anong Lao
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759560
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead at escape pod cluster in Life Support

ArkCharacter.Name: Argenteno Pero
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759565
ArkCharacter.Notes: On board Talos to have his athletic ability duplicated for Neuromods. He was here when the outbreak happened. Now a phantom in his quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: April McGuire
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_844024417322322080
ArkCharacter.Notes: Contest winner

ArkCharacter.Name: Ash Lasair
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759566
ArkCharacter.Notes: Crushed by a collapsing cargo lift

ArkCharacter.Name: Augusto Vera
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759567
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead at Lobby/Arboretum Elevator

ArkCharacter.Name: Austin Cool
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759568
ArkCharacter.Notes: Alive and holding up in Cargo Bay with Sari. His portrait assignement is not a bug. He and Thadeus York are dead ringers for each other

ArkCharacter.Name: Bernard Griffith
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759569
ArkCharacter.Notes: Is one of the corrupted humans in the Crew Facilities intro sequence.

ArkCharacter.Name: Bianca Goodwin
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759571
ArkCharacter.Notes: Lobby Level 3 - Adjacent to Morgan's Office Bianca Goodwin is the handler for any non-employee that boards Talos. This includes visiting VIPs and Test Subjects for Psychotronics. She has an office adjacent to Morgan. Bianca is fastidious, organized and often thought of as a ball-buster by the people that work closely with her. But when it's time to turn on the charm she handles guests with grace and smiles. Bianca puts a great deal of effort into maintaining her appearance. Her office is decorated with accolades and propaganda that glorifies TranStar. At Game Start: Dead in front of escape pods in VIP Shuttle Bay

ArkCharacter.Name: Blaine Cooly
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759573
ArkCharacter.Notes: Blaine, normall working the hardward, went to fill in for Jia while was investigating the disapearence of Grant Lockwood. He locked himself inside the security booth without realizing a phantom was lurking behind him.

ArkCharacter.Name: Brandi Pester
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759575
ArkCharacter.Notes: Entered suicide pact with Eva Loveless after the escape pods failed rather than face the alien menace.

ArkCharacter.Name: Brett Seydel
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759576
ArkCharacter.Notes: Works in GUTs, dead in Crew.

ArkCharacter.Name: Brittany LaValley
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759577
ArkCharacter.Notes: A thermal Phantom in the Fuel Storage room of GUTS. Has the keycard to Shuttle Bay

ArkCharacter.Name: Bruce Cobb
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759578
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in rec room.

ArkCharacter.Name: Caleb Hawethorne
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759579
ArkCharacter.Notes: Has a locked workstation in the analysis area of Simulation Labs. Is one of the corrupted humans in the Crew Facilities intro sequence.

ArkCharacter.Name: Carlos Popinga
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759580
ArkCharacter.Notes: Is one of the corrupted humans in the Crew Facilities intro sequence.

ArkCharacter.Name: Carol Sikes
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759581
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead at escape pod cluster in Life Support

ArkCharacter.Name: Carolyn Wheeler
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759583
ArkCharacter.Notes: Workes as a top level executtive for TranStar. Based in London

ArkCharacter.Name: Chloe Burgess
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759584
ArkCharacter.Notes: Sent as a suicide attacker against the Cook's locked doors and shutters. The cook later dragged her corpse into the freezer.

ArkCharacter.Name: Chris Wade
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759586
ArkCharacter.Notes: Died in initial telepath attack in the cafeteria. Headless at a table.

ArkCharacter.Name: Christopher Smith
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759585
ArkCharacter.Notes: Assigned to Psychotronics. Secretly Alex's loyal man. Aware that Volunteers are fed to the Mimics. Does not know why. Was with Sarah when they were locking down Cargo Bay. He decided to flee to Alex rather than be trapped in there with them. He didn't get very far. Has a keycard to reach the GUTs loading terminal

ArkCharacter.Name: Clarke Rafferty
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759587
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in front of the theater.

ArkCharacter.Name: Clive Lawrence
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759588
ArkCharacter.Notes: Works in the machine shop in the hardware lab. He is a Phantom with the Psychotronics foyer code.

ArkCharacter.Name: Colete May-Shultz
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759589
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the cafeteria

ArkCharacter.Name: Colton Houston
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759590
ArkCharacter.Notes: On board Talos to have his pilot skills recorded for a neuromod. Some of the shuttle pilots on Talos are star-struck.

ArkCharacter.Name: Conrad Birchman
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759591
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Hardware Labs above the IT Hub.

ArkCharacter.Name: Cory Richard
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759592
ArkCharacter.Notes: Guard sent to Arrest Annalise Gallegos. Found dead in her office.

ArkCharacter.Name: Crispin Boyer
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759593
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in psychotronics entrance beneath Kletka

ArkCharacter.Name: Daisy White
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759595
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the cafeteria

ArkCharacter.Name: Dan Billingsly
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759596
ArkCharacter.Notes: Spawns when player reads the message in the comm terminal

ArkCharacter.Name: Daniel Landon
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759597
ArkCharacter.Notes: Controlled by telepath in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Danielle Sho
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759598
ArkCharacter.Notes: Chief archivist. Player looks for her voice samples to get in Deep Storage. Plays Melinda Shadowcorner in the paper RPG game Has a private room in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Darcy Maddox
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759608
ArkCharacter.Notes: Alive and holding up in Cargo Bay with Sarah

ArkCharacter.Name: Dayo Igwe
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759599
ArkCharacter.Notes: Character the player finds trapped in a crate outside Cargo Bay. Later helps player wipe Dahl's memory by uninstalling his neuromods so they can escape aboard the shuttle Has a private room in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: David Branch
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759600
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the cafeteria

ArkCharacter.Name: David Simmonds
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_844024417322325188
ArkCharacter.Notes: Contest winner

ArkCharacter.Name: Demetri Bowser
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759601
ArkCharacter.Notes: Security guard who lets Morgan into the sim tests at the begining of the game. He is a trained EMT

ArkCharacter.Name: Diane Washington
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759603
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in cargo loading area

ArkCharacter.Name: Donald Hall
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759605
ArkCharacter.Notes: Donald was trying to get to the escape pods but found that they weren't working. He noticed Frank rushing a woman to get into one of them and even brandishing a gun so others would stay back. Their launch failed which seemed like justice but then he realized none of the others worked or had the capability to work. The oxygen went off and some people suffocated and others were killed by some of the aliens that made it through the barriers.

ArkCharacter.Name: Drew Springer
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759606
ArkCharacter.Notes: Flight engineer died trying to get into an escape pod. Had an argument with Franklin Jones, who is stuck in the launch tube of an escape pod.

ArkCharacter.Name: Don Davis
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_844024417322324272
ArkCharacter.Notes: Contest winner

ArkCharacter.Name: Eddie Voss
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759609
ArkCharacter.Notes: Made it through the chaos of the station and finally arrived in the escape pod room only to meet his demise.

ArkCharacter.Name: Edward Douglas
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759611
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the cargo tunnel of GUTS

ArkCharacter.Name: Ekaterina Mulsaev
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759612
ArkCharacter.Notes: Hanging out in the office

ArkCharacter.Name: Elias Black
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759613
ArkCharacter.Notes: Night shift Contrary to the day guard, Elias is silent and moody. The night post suits him well. Since his shift is rarely eventful he spends much of his time reading or playing games. He keeps some books stashed away at his post when he is off duty. Plays Stabfellow in the paper RPG in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Elizabeth Bay
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759614
ArkCharacter.Notes: Stationed in Trauma, dead in Crew

ArkCharacter.Name: Elle Gold
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759615
ArkCharacter.Notes: In a forbidden relationship with Lawrence Berger. They could be fired if it came to light.

ArkCharacter.Name: Emily Carter
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759621
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead at escape pod cluster in Life Support Saw Mike Broadway fall in the Eel Tank. Left a Transcribe about it.

ArkCharacter.Name: Emma Beatty
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759616
ArkCharacter.Notes: Member of the RPG group. Enslaved by the telepath in crew quarters, hanging out by the pool.

ArkCharacter.Name: Emmanuel Mendez
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759617
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead at TranStar sign in Exterior

ArkCharacter.Name: Enoch Kouneva
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759619
ArkCharacter.Notes: Rasied as a phantom in Cargo Bay

ArkCharacter.Name: Eric Berger
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759620
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead just outside Psychotronics in the GUT.

ArkCharacter.Name: Erica Teague
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759622
ArkCharacter.Notes: Died leading a team to the Lobby/Arboretum, only to learn it is locked down. Conversation recorded on a Transcribe with Sari

ArkCharacter.Name: Eva Loveless
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759623
ArkCharacter.Notes: Entered suicide pact with Brenda Handley after the escape pods failed rather than face the alien menace.

ArkCharacter.Name: Evelyn McCarthy
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759624
ArkCharacter.Notes: corpse in arboretum

ArkCharacter.Name: Evgeni Charzov
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759626
ArkCharacter.Notes: Killed while escaping from volunteer area. Prisoner # V-041255-09

ArkCharacter.Name: Frank Jones
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759628
ArkCharacter.Notes: Short version: Trapped in the launch tube of the VIP Shuttle Bay Escape Pods.

ArkCharacter.Name: Franklin Goode
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759627
ArkCharacter.Notes: Test coordinator for the Artax Propulsion system. Currently dead in the Machine Shop in Hardware Labs (showpiece).

ArkCharacter.Name: Franz Klinger
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759629
ArkCharacter.Notes: Telepath thrall harassing Luka

ArkCharacter.Name: Galel Seif
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759631
ArkCharacter.Notes: Works w/ Mia in the shuttle bay control room. Gale was in the planning room when all hell broke loose. She stayed in there unable to leave until the oxygen levels depleted.

ArkCharacter.Name: Gary Snow
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759632
ArkCharacter.Notes: Telepath thrall outside the gym. Commits suicide if the player doesn't act fast

ArkCharacter.Name: Garfield Langly
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759633
ArkCharacter.Notes: Lobby Welcome Kiosk Garfield is intimately knowledgeable about all of the "public" areas on Talos. He knows about all of the social and entertainment events, special features and key people on the station. He is tasked with helping crew members with any non-job related tasks or interests. He jots down notes with people's names and interesting facts about them to help him remember who's who. At Game Start: Dead in front of escape pods in VIP Shuttle Bay Edit: Might be a phantom carrying the code to Psych

ArkCharacter.Name: Gerald Wildman
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759635
ArkCharacter.Notes: Boss of the Cargo Bay - Died trying to put out the fire

ArkCharacter.Name: Grant Lockwood
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759637
ArkCharacter.Notes: Grant was fired but HR prematurely de-activated before he was put on the shuttle to leave the station. Was attempting to sabotage station. Dead in the exterior.

ArkCharacter.Name: Gregory Kepner
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759638
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the Machine Shop of Hardware Labs.

ArkCharacter.Name: Grete Mikkelsen
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759639
ArkCharacter.Notes: Engineer handling the helcopter simulation stage. Corpse is near the workstation.

ArkCharacter.Name: Gus Magill
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759640
ArkCharacter.Notes: Has a lengthy transcribe convo about what a Reployer does. Dead in Cargo Bay. Has his computer password on him.

ArkCharacter.Name: Gustav Leitner
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759641
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Was on Talos to have his musical abilities recorded for a neuromod. In recent years age has started to claim his ability to play. In this way he hopes to preserve his talent.

ArkCharacter.Name: Guy Jameson
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759643
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Crew in the karaoke room of the Yellow Tulip

ArkCharacter.Name: Hadley Dalton
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759644
ArkCharacter.Notes: Hadley is also the voice actor that recorded the pilot conversations for the simulated helicopter ride in the Sim Lab. Hadley is the corpse that Helen Croft is looting in the skill recorder.

ArkCharacter.Name: Hank Majors
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759646
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead at Lobby/Arboretum Elevator

ArkCharacter.Name: Hans Kelstrup
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759647
ArkCharacter.Notes: Has a private room in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Harley Grainger
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759648
ArkCharacter.Notes: Lobby Level 2 Harley was briefly a star professional baseball player. He enjoyed two seasons of fame and popularity before an injury cut his career short. His name is still widely known and he leverages this in his sales pitches. People just seem to like Harley. His dreams of being a baseball star faded, but now he clings to thin hopes that someday Alex may reward him with an athletic neuromod that will restore his lost skill. He dreams that he can once again hear the stadium full of people cheering him on, but each year that passes fades that dream a little more. His office has some select memorabilia from his career, and he uses it to charm clients with tales of his glory days. At Game Start: Holed up in Lobby IT supply closet, but ends up corrupted in Life Support if player sides with Dahl.

ArkCharacter.Name: Harvey Clausen
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759649
ArkCharacter.Notes: One of the telepath victims in Crew.

ArkCharacter.Name: Helen Barker-Combs
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759650
ArkCharacter.Notes: She has been researching the paranormal and Psi since it used to be a crackpot subject. Over the course of her career the true nature of Psi has been scientifically proven and developed. She has risen from "crazy psychic nutjob that believes in ghosts" to become a leading expert in the latent psi powers of human beings.

ArkCharacter.Name: Helen Croft
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759652
ArkCharacter.Notes: Works in Sim Lab. Is looting a corpse in the skill recorder when a phantom kills her.

ArkCharacter.Name: Hendrik DeVries
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759653
ArkCharacter.Notes: Works in Trauma and knows about the human sacrifice going on is Psychotronics. Loyal to alex and never says a thing. Has a private room in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Hope Ellis
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759654
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Hardware Labs in the break room.

ArkCharacter.Name: Hunter Hale
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759655
ArkCharacter.Notes: Hunter Hale is one of the pilots who works in the Shuttle Bay. Hunter typically transports 'Volunteers' and sales teams to earth and back. Alex recruited Hale to secretly transport some sets of Volunteers back to the psychotronics lab. The are the volunteers that are fed to mimics for replication and production of exotic materials. Hale was transporting a group of volunteers when the outbreak happened. As he swept around the moon and began making his way back to the station, toward Psychotronics, disaster struck. He tried contacting psychotronics, but no response. Then bridge, but no response. Then he contacted shuttle bay to come back for a landing. He was killed at that point by mimics aboard the ship.

ArkCharacter.Name: Indigo Lake
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759658
ArkCharacter.Notes: Is one of the corrupted humans in the Crew Facilities intro sequence.

ArkCharacter.Name: Iris Stein
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759659
ArkCharacter.Notes: dead in lobby on way to hardware

ArkCharacter.Name: Ivy Song
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759660
ArkCharacter.Notes: Talks to Anton about trying to hack into Deep Storage. Currently a phantom in Danielle's quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Izumi Minami
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759661
ArkCharacter.Notes: Izumi is also the voice of all of the Talos public announcements

ArkCharacter.Name: Jada Marks
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759662
ArkCharacter.Notes: Has a private room in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Jaden Medina
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759663
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] VIP visiting Talos to have her abilities recorded for a neuromod.

ArkCharacter.Name: Janos Jozsef
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759665
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab

ArkCharacter.Name: Jean Faure
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759666
ArkCharacter.Notes: Stationed in Life Support, died in Power Plant

ArkCharacter.Name: Jessica Wiley
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759669
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Cargo bay A - Floating in space

ArkCharacter.Name: Jorgen Thorstein
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759670
ArkCharacter.Notes: Age: Late 50's Director of the Hardware (Prototype) Labs PHD in Materials Science Divorced. Grandfather. Swedish family background Was part of the team that created the formula for the goo gun material. Probably what got him promoted / hired. Has a private room in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Jason Chang
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759671
ArkCharacter.Notes: Lobby Level 3 Morgan Karl's Personal Assistant Jason thinks Morgan is the coolest person ever. He is in tight with Morgan and wields a certain amount of authority as his PA. He does not hesitate to drop Morgan's name with veiled and implied threats to get what he wants, and what he wants is always in Morgan's best interests. Recently he had seen distinct changes in Morgan's personality, and then Morgan stopped coming back from the Sim Lab altogether. Jason is neat, organized and efficient.

ArkCharacter.Name: Jerome Elliot
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759672
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab

ArkCharacter.Name: Jia Kyung-Ho
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759674
ArkCharacter.Notes: Jia is a security officer from Shuttlebay that was headed to Deep Storage to re-activate Grant Lockwoods tracking chip. Grant was fired but HR prematurely de-activated before he was put on the shuttle to leave the station. She died near the guts entrance trying to escape the aliens.

ArkCharacter.Name: Jiao-Long Heng
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759675
ArkCharacter.Notes: Assigned to Sim Lab

ArkCharacter.Name: Jody Barrett
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759676
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Workes as a top level executtive for TranStar. Based in Stockholm

ArkCharacter.Name: Joel Weeks
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759677
ArkCharacter.Notes: Helmet Head

ArkCharacter.Name: John Haskins
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759678
ArkCharacter.Notes: He is the corpse that provides a shotgun to the player

ArkCharacter.Name: Joseph McSorley
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759683
ArkCharacter.Notes: Cargo bay employee, dead in karaoke room in Crew

ArkCharacter.Name: Jovan Gravilovic
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759684
ArkCharacter.Notes: Jovan is killed by the mimic in the decontamination scene.

ArkCharacter.Name: Josh Dalton
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759685
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the cargo tunnel of the GUTs

ArkCharacter.Name: Julien Howard
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759686
ArkCharacter.Notes: Also has invented a formulae to make one of the TranStar fruits super amazing. Dr. Julien Howard has come up with a formula (now a blueprint on his body) that is ready to be tested in the Arboretum. This blueprint with create a bio-seed or fertilizer that will rapidly grow a super fruit on the trees in a marked section of trees in the Arboretum. He was on his way to a fabricator to create one but then the alien breakout happened and he tried getting to safety in the Arboretum but met his demise on one of the high up rocks.

ArkCharacter.Name: Kade Mason
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759688
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the freezer

ArkCharacter.Name: Karisma Chouhan
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759690
ArkCharacter.Notes: She is dead in the exterior portion of Hardware Labs

ArkCharacter.Name: Keira Whitman
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759691
ArkCharacter.Notes: Trauma center security officer. Dead in Crew

ArkCharacter.Name: Kelly Randolph
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759692
ArkCharacter.Notes: Kelly hates being in space. When she went to work at TranStar she never dreamed she would be assigned to Talos. She wanted to say no, but the money is too good. She does everything she can to avoid the vistas of space and forget where she is. Including periodically taking some medication to ease her nerves. She has managed to make some friends in the Trauma Center that have slipped her pharmas before. She almost leaps for joy when it is time to make a trip to Earth for an install, but also dreads the flight. She is contemplating resigning her position after one or two more pay cycles

ArkCharacter.Name: Kevin Sabian
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759693
ArkCharacter.Notes: Referred to as the concierge. Sent as a suicide attacker against the Cook's locked doors and shutters. The cook later dragged his corpse into the freezer.

ArkCharacter.Name: Kevin Hague
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759694
ArkCharacter.Notes: Alive and holding up in Cargo Bay with Sari Married to Nicole Hague

ArkCharacter.Name: Kimberly Bomo
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759695
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in GUTS by cystoids.

ArkCharacter.Name: Kirk Remmer
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759696
ArkCharacter.Notes: Is now a Phantom. Led a group of people to the Life Support Escape pods before being killed and converted.

ArkCharacter.Name: Kolya Korneyev
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759697
ArkCharacter.Notes: Prisoner # V-011155-17; died in the derelict shuttle

ArkCharacter.Name: Kristine Lloyd
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759698
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab, next to the psychoscope in the women's restroom

ArkCharacter.Name: Lane Carpenter
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759700
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Hardware Labs as a Phantom

ArkCharacter.Name: Laura McAvoy
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759701
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Lobby.

ArkCharacter.Name: Laurel Davis
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759702
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead with a malfunctioning suit in the GUTs.

ArkCharacter.Name: Lawrence Baxter
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759703
ArkCharacter.Notes: Is now a Phantom Was in a forbidden relationship with Elle Gold. They could be fired if it came to light.

ArkCharacter.Name: Leon Woods
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759704
ArkCharacter.Notes: Leon bringing in some food for the sky lounge when the outbreak happened. He helped setup the blockade and headed down to the escape pods.

ArkCharacter.Name: Lia Macy
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759705
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the mail room

ArkCharacter.Name: Lily Morris
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759706
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the hallway leading to the lift in Arboretum.

ArkCharacter.Name: Lisa Larson
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759707
ArkCharacter.Notes: Is one of the corrupted humans in the Crew Facilities intro sequence.

ArkCharacter.Name: Lizzy Colton
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759708
ArkCharacter.Notes: In arboretum. Vessel for shotgun goodies.

ArkCharacter.Name: Lorenzo Calvino
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759710
ArkCharacter.Notes: Inventor of the Looking Glass Technology. Hides some of his meds in a secret compartment in the Hardware Labs. Later, in the crew counselor's office, there should be more notes/ convos about his mind slipping. Has a private room in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Lucia Jimenez
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759711
ArkCharacter.Notes: Scientist monitoring Morgan as he moves through the test sequence Corpse found in the Trauma Center

ArkCharacter.Name: Luka Golubkin
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759712
ArkCharacter.Notes: Luka is actually a volunteer / prisoner. but he is impersonating Mitchell, the dead cook. Prisoner # V-010655-37

ArkCharacter.Name: Luther Glass
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759713
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the Trauma Center

ArkCharacter.Name: Maliah Fowles
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759715
ArkCharacter.Notes: Assigned to Crew Facilities. Sent to investigate Annalise Gallegos room. Found dead there.

ArkCharacter.Name: Marc Sellers
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759716
ArkCharacter.Notes: Married to Regina Sellers. They got married on Talos. Morgan officiated.

ArkCharacter.Name: Marco Simmons
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759717
ArkCharacter.Notes: Scientist monitoring Morgan as he moves through the test sequence. Also responsible for helping Morgan install new Neuromods during test prep.

ArkCharacter.Name: Marietta Kyrkos
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759718
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Arboretum. She was on the way to Crew Quarters to fetch the Golden Gun from Captain Mark's quarters. Has a keycard to the room and code to her safe.

ArkCharacter.Name: Martin Giroud
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759719
ArkCharacter.Notes: Day shift Kind and likable, quite the looker and always charming. He chats easily with people passing by his station and manages to talk easily to the "higher ups" that normally ignore security. He has a contraband flower that was given to him as a gift by Iris Stein, a worker in the Arboretum. Martin is tasked with providing information to new recruits and guests aboard Talos. He knows much of the "soap opera" storylines that happen here as well. At Game Start: Dead in the Lobby. Took a couple of mimics with him.

ArkCharacter.Name: Mary Malinaro
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759720
ArkCharacter.Notes: Works in Hardware Labs, dead in Crew. Defenestrated in the vestibule.

ArkCharacter.Name: Matt Cothron
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759725
ArkCharacter.Notes: Assigned to Bridge. Listens in on all sorts of critical communications as part of his job. Part of Sarai's "loyal team", reporting back to her.

ArkCharacter.Name: Maxine Ford
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759728
ArkCharacter.Notes: At Game Start: Holed up in Lobby IT supply closet, but ends up corrupted in Life Support if player sides with Dahl.

ArkCharacter.Name: Mia Bayer
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759729
ArkCharacter.Notes: Mia stayed in the control room so she could direct her people from there but lost contact with them over time. She had some extra oxygen but it wasn't enough to save her.

ArkCharacter.Name: Mike Devlin
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759732
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Crew Quarters. Works in Neuromod Division

ArkCharacter.Name: Mike Turner
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759733
ArkCharacter.Notes: Original wrench wrangler. Not on duty the day Morgan escaped. Usually the wrench wragler, but he was out sick on the day Morgan escaped. Mike had a nasty shock the day before and Trauma Center cleared him for bed rest.

ArkCharacter.Name: Mischa Lazarev
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759735
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in lobby tunnel t

ArkCharacter.Name: Mitsuko Tokaji
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759736
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab - Lost parts of her fingers when they were bitten off by Luka Golubkin.

ArkCharacter.Name: Miyu Okabe
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759737
ArkCharacter.Notes: Female. Assistant to Dr. Calvino. Kind of hates him. Dead in near Grav Shaft.

ArkCharacter.Name: Nash Underwood
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759740
ArkCharacter.Notes: Assigned to Executive Offices (Lobby)

ArkCharacter.Name: Natasha Nikova
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759741
ArkCharacter.Notes: DO NOT PLACE!!!

ArkCharacter.Name: Neil Warnes
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759742
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in cafeteria.

ArkCharacter.Name: Neno Nikolic
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759743
ArkCharacter.Notes: Killed by fellow inmates during outbreak. Prisoner # V-110655-16

ArkCharacter.Name: Nickie Tannar
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759745
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the kitchen of Hardware Labs

ArkCharacter.Name: Nicole Hague
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759746
ArkCharacter.Notes: Married to Kevin Hague, a security officer in Cargo Bay. She is dead now and converted to a phantom

ArkCharacter.Name: Nils Kjaergaard
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759747
ArkCharacter.Notes: Nils tried getting people to the esape pods and expected more people but found out with the rest of the people down there that all but one were not functional. She fought off the aliens until overcome by the lack of oxygen.

ArkCharacter.Name: Octavia Figgs
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759748
ArkCharacter.Notes: Works on keeping the cleaner bots online, serviced, etc.

ArkCharacter.Name: Oscar Groysman
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759749
ArkCharacter.Notes: Prisoner # V-060155-06

ArkCharacter.Name: Oliver Benoit
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759750
ArkCharacter.Notes: Under control of the telepath in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Otto Lauda
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759752
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab

ArkCharacter.Name: Patricia Varma
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759754
ArkCharacter.Notes: Engineer working in the hallway on Morgan's first day.

ArkCharacter.Name: Patricia Wang
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759755
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead security guard near cafeteria. Conveniently has stun gun w/ammo to deal with corrupted humans

ArkCharacter.Name: Paul R. Fernandez
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759756
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Works as a top level executtive for TranStar. Based in Houston

ArkCharacter.Name: Peter Coleman
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759759
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the Hardware Labs Machine Shop.

ArkCharacter.Name: Quinten Purvis
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759762
ArkCharacter.Notes: Is helping Annalise Gallegos smuggle incriminating evidence regarding the volunteers off Talos I. Hiding in a crate in Cargo Bay waiting to be shipped off. Chopped his own hand off and threw it in an eel tank to avoid detection.

ArkCharacter.Name: Ramon Ridley
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759763
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead near the Magnetosphere entrance. Propulsion system malfunction, similar to Anders Kline.

ArkCharacter.Name: Randall Wood
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759764
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in the maintenance crawlspace in Hardware Labs.

ArkCharacter.Name: Rani Chaudhary
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759766
ArkCharacter.Notes: Possessed by a Telepath in Arboretum

ArkCharacter.Name: Regina Sellers
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759767
ArkCharacter.Notes: Married to Mark Sellers. They got married on Talos. Morgan officiated. Controlled by the telepath in Crew Quarters.

ArkCharacter.Name: Rich Ivers
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759768
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in fabrication

ArkCharacter.Name: Richard Coveney
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759769
ArkCharacter.Notes: Lobby Level 2 Native Londoner, Richard has been intensely homesick. He doesn't lament much about missing London because he doesn't want to introduce any doubts to his commitment to the job, but reminders of home have slowly accrued around him. He envies that his assistant (Yuri Kimura) actually gets to travel to Earth periodically. Richard has a sister in London that sends him postcards and mementos. At Game Start: Holed up in Lobby IT supply closet, but ends up corrupted in Life Support if player sides with Dahl.

ArkCharacter.Name: Riley Butler
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759770
ArkCharacter.Notes: Assigned to Bridge. Was in charge of the deployment of Security Operators. Like a K9 officer, but instead of dogs it's robots. Was in the Cargo Bay adjacent security office when it blew up, now floating in the cave.

ArkCharacter.Name: Robert Gage
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759771
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in a conference room. Friends with Alice Aiken.

ArkCharacter.Name: Roger Meir
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759773
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead at Lobby/Arboretum Elevator

ArkCharacter.Name: Ruby Stone
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759776
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab

ArkCharacter.Name: Salman Kapoor
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759779
ArkCharacter.Notes: Stationed in Hardware Lab, currently controlled by the telepath in Crew Quarters

ArkCharacter.Name: Sam Hertz
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759780
ArkCharacter.Notes: Alive and holding up in Cargo Bay with Sari

ArkCharacter.Name: Sean Larsen
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759783
ArkCharacter.Notes: Security Guard for Hardware Labs. Dead in the demonstration observation area. Contains employee entrance keycard.

ArkCharacter.Name: Scott Parker
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759785
ArkCharacter.Notes: Scott turned off the power to the grav lifts in hopes it would slow down the spread of the aliens. He also was turning off the oxygen for a short time but was killed so he was not able to turn the system back on.

ArkCharacter.Name: Skye Braxton
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759786
ArkCharacter.Notes: Member of the crew band. Her transcribe is in her bunk, A04.

ArkCharacter.Name: Steve Folson
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759788
ArkCharacter.Notes: Steve is a bit of an asshole and challenging to work with. He used to work in Deep Storage but the other data engineers grew to despise him. Danielle Sho transferred him to this post to separate him from the others. Now he works among the executives and sees this as a sort of promotion, which has made him even more insufferable. He ruffled a few feathers in the Marketing Department and was ordered to stay at his post at all times. Danielle began the paperwork to have him removed from Talos and assigned Earthside. Steve suspects this and has really let things go. If he spills coffee he doesn't care. Things are kind of a mess at his post right up until an old stale sandwich revealed itself as a mimic and killed him. At Game Start: Holed up in Lobby IT supply closet, but ends up corrupted in Life Support if player sides with Dahl.

ArkCharacter.Name: Steven Mueller
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759789
ArkCharacter.Notes: Psychotronics Lab

ArkCharacter.Name: Sylvain Bellamy
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759791
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dr. Bellamy is seen at the start of the game administering some tests to Morgan. He is all business. An avid coffee drinker. He has an office here but spends almost all of his time in the Sim Lab, so this office is almost pristine. At Game Start: Killed in Sim Lab by a mimic when Morgan is testing. His body is later stashed somewhere TBD

ArkCharacter.Name: Talia Brooks
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759792
ArkCharacter.Notes: Married to Kevin Brooks in Security

ArkCharacter.Name: Tamiko Hayashi
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759793
ArkCharacter.Notes: Alive and holding up in Cargo Bay with Sari

ArkCharacter.Name: Tana Vale
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759794
ArkCharacter.Notes: Sucked out into space when the bay door failed. Her body floats around out there now

ArkCharacter.Name: Terrance Carlisle
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759795
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Workes as a top level executtive for TranStar. Based in San Francisco

ArkCharacter.Name: Thaddeus York
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759796
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead in Hardware Labs in Demonstration Room. Phantom battle with goo gun. Right-hand man for the director. He was gathering as many materials as he could before the battle.

ArkCharacter.Name: Thomas Tucker
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759797
ArkCharacter.Notes: - Lobby (cube farm) Smooth talking and good looking. And up-and-comer in the TranStar organization. At least that's what he thinks. But there is precious little for a marketing guy to do here on the station. Sometimes he gets to rub elbows with the stars, to make sure they remain convinced that they have made the right choice, but by the time they have arrived a Talos the contracts that prevent them from backing out are already in place. His latest project has been to interview Talos crew for a documentary-style sales tool about Life in Space. A bit that glorifies TranStar and really upsells neuromods. He has gathered lots of notes about the key people of Talos and what they do

ArkCharacter.Name: Thomas Lutz
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759802
ArkCharacter.Notes: Died in initial telepath attack in the cafeteria. Headless at a table.

ArkCharacter.Name: Tina Snow
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759798
ArkCharacter.Notes: dead in lobby foyer

ArkCharacter.Name: Titus Kromwell
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759799
ArkCharacter.Notes: Hardware Labs, dead in the think tank area

ArkCharacter.Name: Tobias Frost
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759800
ArkCharacter.Notes: Worked on a device that makes water restore psi. Has the device on his body.

ArkCharacter.Name: Todd Matsuyama
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759801
ArkCharacter.Notes: Tom made it into the shuttle bay through the exterior airlock. He made it to the escape pods but realized he couldn't breathe and was overcome by a mimic.

ArkCharacter.Name: Tom Cooper
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759803
ArkCharacter.Notes: Tom was trying to get to Mia to help her but was surprised by a mimic while on his way up to the control room. He was trying to use the goo gun to climb up to the upper level near the grav shaft.

ArkCharacter.Name: Trevor J. Young
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759804
ArkCharacter.Notes: This is the worker who walked into an experiment in psychotronics without a psychoscope. He was touched by a telepath and open a containment cell that contained a mimic, starting the outbreak on Talos. He was put under observation in psychotronics, determined to not be suffering under any adverse effects, and had his neuromods uninstalled, wiping his memory. He was put into the quarantine in trauma for further observation until Alex can figure out what to do with him.

ArkCharacter.Name: Umi Isaka
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759805
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead at escape pod cluster in Life Support

ArkCharacter.Name: Vitaly Razin
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759806
ArkCharacter.Notes: Prisoner # V-060155-05; died in the derelict shuttle

ArkCharacter.Name: Victor Yablonsky
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759807
ArkCharacter.Notes: Prisoner # V-041255-01

ArkCharacter.Name: Vincent Schubel
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759808
ArkCharacter.Notes: Is one of the corrupted humans in the Crew Facilities intro sequence.

ArkCharacter.Name: Veer Singh
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759809
ArkCharacter.Notes: Security guard with the GLOO gun that you first encounter on your way out of neuromod.

ArkCharacter.Name: Walther Dahl
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759810
ArkCharacter.Notes: Leader of the mercenary recovery team.

ArkCharacter.Name: William Yu
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759811
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Father of Morgan and Alex Yu. Chairman of the Board of TranStar Directors.

ArkCharacter.Name: Will Mitchell
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759812
ArkCharacter.Notes: This is the actual cook. Luka took his place when the shit hit the fan. He's dead in the freezer. Maybe he was found that way? Has also delivered food to a marked cargo container in Cargo Bay to help Quinten Purvis smuggle evidence off the station.

ArkCharacter.Name: Yuri Andronov
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759813
ArkCharacter.Notes: Mikhaila's father. The evidence of his existence and demise is recorded in a final experimental log which the player can dig up in order to give Mikhaila closure.

ArkCharacter.Name: Yuri Kimura
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759814
ArkCharacter.Notes: Lobby Level 2 Yuri was an avid surfer back on Earth, and every time she goes back she manages to squeeze in some time at the beach before returning to Talos. She has a few wave pictures at her desk. He also has a lucky conch shell that she has taken with her on every trip (she's been into the gravity well and back over a dozen times now - perhaps a whiteboard tracks how many trips the techs have in an unofficial contest) but this time she forgot to take her lucky shell with her. Too bad. At Game Start: Not on Talos. Had boarded a shuttle to make a delivery to Earth

ArkCharacter.Name: Zachary West
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759815
ArkCharacter.Notes: Dead guy outside of Deep Storage, trying to hack his way in past the voice lock. Provides the clue that you need to find Danielle Sho or her voice samples.

ArkCharacter.Name: Zhao Sun
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759816
ArkCharacter.Notes: Prisoner # V-071855-21; died in the derelict shuttle

ArkCharacter.Name: Station Announcer
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759826
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] The person (pre-recorded) who makes all the general announcements thru the PA system of the sation is Izumi Minami, the Communications Chief stationed on the bridge.

ArkCharacter.Name: Helicopter Pilot
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759827
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] The Chopper Pilot voice was recorded by Hadley Dalton, a neural mapping specialist in the Sim Lab.

ArkCharacter.Name: Suit
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759828
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] VO for player state (e.g. when the 02 goes away or the player recieves a trauma)

ArkCharacter.Name: December
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759829
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: October
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759830
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: KASPAR
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759831
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Tech Operator who works for Dahl. Locks Alex out of all the station systems.

ArkCharacter.Name: BrithdayKid
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_4349723564954732614
ArkCharacter.Notes: Voice message from a kid on earth talking to his parent on Talos

ArkCharacter.Name: Skillet
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759832
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Skillet is a kitchen operator (engineer class). the Kitchen Operator is a cheerful, pleasant robot, eager to serve. Mitchell modified the bots voice and personality wthout persmission.

ArkCharacter.Name: Engineering Operator
ArkCharacter.Label: @npc_engoperator
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Operator - Medical
ArkCharacter.Label: @npc_medoperator
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Operator - Military
ArkCharacter.Label: @npc_militaryoperator
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Operator - Military Copycat
ArkCharacter.Label: @npc_militaryoperatortitle
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] This is a one-off Mil operator that can copy people's voices.

ArkCharacter.Name: Operator - Science
ArkCharacter.Label: @npc_scioperator
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: NeuromodDivision_LabTech1
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759833
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: NeuromodDivision_LabTech2
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759834
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Cinematic_Dr. Calvino
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759835
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Cinematic character in the Hardware Labs

ArkCharacter.Name: Cinematic_Miyu Okabe
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759836
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Cinematic character in the Hardware Labs

ArkCharacter.Name: Alarm Clock
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759837
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] The voice of Morgan's Alarm Clock

ArkCharacter.Name: Cazavor
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759838
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] A psychic weapon facing an exisential crisis.

ArkCharacter.Name: Elevator
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759839
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] The voice of the automated elevators aboard TranStar Talos 1

ArkCharacter.Name: AllSimulationWorkers
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759840
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Computer Voice
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_13680621263415497408
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] The voice of various computers and machines.

ArkCharacter.Name: Diagnostic
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759842
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] The voice of the Diagnostic VO on LG machines.

ArkCharacter.Name: Dispenser
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759843
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Exhibitor
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759844
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] The voice that narrates the museum exhibitions in the lobby was recorded by Izumi Minami, the Communications Chief stationed on the Bridge. She also records the Talos PA announcements.

ArkCharacter.Name: Group Workstation: Hardware Labs
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759845
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] Small Scale Workstation in the Think Tank area in Hardware Labs.

ArkCharacter.Name: HumanArmed
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759846
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] placeholder human

ArkCharacter.Name: HumanUnarmed
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759847
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] placeholder human

ArkCharacter.Name: Placeholder
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759848
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER] This is a placeholder that we can stub in in places where we don't know who should be assigned yet, but have to have a character assignment.

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Neuromod Division
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759849
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Arboretum
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759850
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Crew Quarters
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759851
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: G.U.T.
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759852
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Hardware Lab
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759853
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Power Plant
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_844024417327504122
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Life Support
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759854
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Lobby
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759855
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Shuttle Bay
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759856
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Security Login: Trauma
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759857
ArkCharacter.Notes: [NOT A CREW MEMBER]

ArkCharacter.Name: Turret
ArkCharacter.Label: @loc_15373294129892759858
